pkgmetadata.longdescription: Stochastic Model for Analysis of Longitudinal Data // Utilities to estimate parameters of stochastic process and modeling survival trajectories and time-to-event outcomes observed from longitudinal studies. Miscellaneous function for data preparation is also provided. For more information, see: "Stochastic model for analysis of longitudinal data on aging and mortality" by Yashin A. et al, 2007, Mathematical Biosciences, 208(2), 538-551 DOI:10.1016/j.mbs.2006.11.006.
